Emily Odoemenam (amụrụ n'ihe dị ka n'afọ 1975) bụ onye Naijirịa bụbu onye na-agba ọsọ
O sonyere na asọmpi obodo na nke mba ụwa na egwuregwu na-anọchite anya Naijirịa

O ritere ọlaọcha na ọla nchara na 1990 African Championships in Athletics na ọlaọcha ọzọ na 1993 African Championships na Athletics n'ihe omume mita 200 na 400.
Emily sonyekwara na 1993 World Championships in Athletics nke ụmụ nwanyị 4 × 400 mita relay n'akụkụ Omolade Akinremi, Omotayo Akinremi na Olabisi Afolabi.
